Reviews.Title: Great budget camera
Reviews.Author: Vincente Carreon
Reviews.Content: Just received this camera in the mail from a Cyber Monday purchase. I've played with it for a few hours and can say that this is a user-friendly, nice pocket budget camera. I've taken several pictures with it in several different light settings and I am more than pleased. The menu system is easy to use and straight forward. There are some different setting modes that allow for better pictures of different subjects (kids, pets, close ups). I dont plan on using this, as I just want to take pictures without messing with the menus, but it's there for those who want it.The HD video recorder is what initially attracted me to this camera. The quality of the video is great as viewed on my Macbook and it looks just as high quality on Youtube.This camera is certainly worth the low price. Give it a shot. Would make a great gift for young photogs.

Reviews.Title: A good camera if you are not expecting the world
Reviews.Author: Marbles
Reviews.Content: I got this camera on a Cyber Monday deal and was skeptical right from the start. I take a lot of pictures and was looking for something that was small, quick, and good. The first hour I had it I regretted the purchase, mostly bcs of the aesthetics. I didnt like the housing, the battery cover slides out easily and is plastic so I can see it breaking easy. The screen is not great and makes pictures look over saturated. I thought the skins were a cute idea but not worth keeping the camera so it almost went back into the box for a return ... but I had an event that night and decided to bring it along. After a night of use I decided that I really liked the pictures it took, it was quick to start up, and while I wasnt keen on the lag between hitting the shutter button and the actual picture being taken, once I got used to it I was able to compensate.All in all Im pretty happy with it. I took it to my dear friend's daughter's first birthday party today and was really satisfied with all the pictures I took. The only ones I deleted were due to uncooperative babies, not an incapable camera. That says a lot. So, if you arent expecting the world, this is a pretty neat little camera. I just worry that it wont withstand every day wear and tear. ::shrug:: We'll see.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Heather J. Mitchell "heatherj"
Reviews.Content: I like Pentax, so I decided to get this camera because not only does it have like 14 MP or so, but it was only $99. Now that we got it, it does take pretty good pictures. In low light sometimes it has trouble focusing completely, but we have yet to discover all the little features in it so that might help if we do that. Overlal it seems to be a very good quality, compact, small, inexpensive digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Good at half the price.
Reviews.Author: Pogopedia
Reviews.Content: This camera produces sharp images relatively quickly but the process is made awkward by the LCD's extremely narrow viewing angle and an intense flash that washes out near subjects. EVEN IF you can live with such weaknesses, don't expect ANY service from Pentax or their Authorized agents - the company disowned this apparently disposable model as soon as it was dumped on the market. A slightly improved design followed it by weeks. Even simple requests like replacing the designed-to-be-lost faceplate screws just pissed off the elusive Support Department. Check your vintage loyalty to Pentax and skip these disappointing low-end offerings. Your (parent's) Spotmatic is rolling over in its shoebox.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Tish "Tish Jenkins"
Reviews.Content: Bought for my college age daughter for Christmas. She loved that it takes good pictures easily and also really loved that you can change its "skins" to make it look different - plaid for christmas, palm trees at the beach, etc. Good price, good camera, fun appearance.

Reviews.Title: Camera Ready?
Reviews.Author: Ellen L. Platt
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and compact.  The thing that bothered (bothers) me is the information guide.  The  booklet that comes with it is practically useless and putting a disc in my computer for instructions of over 200 pages is ridiculous.  I like instructions that I can read and carry with me if I need them.  The price was right but the instructions are not.

Reviews.Title: Delighted
Reviews.Author: praia
Reviews.Content: The camera fulfilled all my expectations.  I love the figures and frames that I can add to my pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my girlfriend, she took a picture and cut it out for the face plate. She dropped it once also from my truck and it survived with just a scratch on the edge.

Reviews.Title: Bang for you buck
Reviews.Author: Enmanuel Hilario
Reviews.Content: Im reading people review this product like they bought a 400 dollar camera... fact is this camera is great for the price, pictures don't come up nice on the camera display, but when you pass them on to your PC, they look just fine. My only complain, if i should have one, is that sometimes the battery cover comes off... and all i have to do is put it back on and carry on with my life.

Reviews.Title: Miss
Reviews.Author: Loanne
Reviews.Content: It's great for the gal/guy who needs a camera that would fit in her tiny purse/bag/backpack, and there is a bit of array of options.Images turns out great.One bad thing: no case and a bit tiny for my clumsy self. It is versatile for active people who do not want to carry 20 pounds for equipment to take pictures.And especially not bad for the price.

Reviews.Title: An OK little camera
Reviews.Author: Joe Mack
Reviews.Content: The Optio RS1000 takes good pictures and fits into a blackberry case for ease of carry.Decent but a little fragile, and the battery door pops open way to easily.

Reviews.Title: Good for everyday use
Reviews.Author: HTP
Reviews.Content: If you want a fairly cheap camera for everyday use, you should definitely consider this one.  It offers a fairly good number of light settings and options, and the menu is easy to figure out. The picture quality is decent.  Compared to other compact cameras I've used, pictures taken in natural light setting are not as blurry.  Of course, you can't expect DSLR quality pictures.One negative is that it feels somewhat cheaply made, especially the casing and the buttons in the back.  It's a little bulkier than I expected too.  But neither of these really bother me so much.  I was just looking for a cheap camera I could use to take pictures with when I go out.I'm not much of a video person, so I can't give much input on that aspect.Overall, it's better than I expected given the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: cant buy a better beater camera
Reviews.Author: bkzk100
Reviews.Content: for the price you cant find a better camera to carry around in your pocket. carry it every where and if you break it you are only out $60.

Reviews.Title: maybe the worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: Fernando C. Cardoso
Reviews.Content: even my cheap phone do it better! it is a cute camera (the front of it cause the back is as plains as usual) but the photos it gets are awful. really awful... returned after a week....

Reviews.Title: Gio
Reviews.Author: gio
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this purchase. Takes brilliant photos and a video shoot here with various modes. The quality is higher than the price

Reviews.Title: It's Small It's Cheap And It Works!
Reviews.Author: Charles Percoco "Wildcatbuff"
Reviews.Content: If you can pick it up for about half the price which is what I did this is a great find.I have had it for about 2 years and it still works. It is made of cheap plastic which in this case is good based on price because it is light as a feather, it is tiny enough that it will easily fit in a shirt pocket and you won't even know it's there,but the best part is it will kick the holy beejezzus out of any cell phone camera out there. Outdoors in decent light it produces sharp true to color pics, and indoors photos still come out pretty good. Even the HD movie mode is pretty good outdoors. If I could change one thing I guess I would rather have it use two AA batteries because it is cheap enough to keep in the glove box of the car,so that is always there, this way when you are half way to the wedding you are going to and you both realize you left the "good" camera on the kitchen counter you won't feel so bad if you have the little Pentax ready to go.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: tank6192
Reviews.Content: I could hardly wait for this to come in. im in afghanistan right now, and all of my friends have cameras to take pics with, so when i got this it was exacatly what i had expected!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera... When it worked
Reviews.Author: stevec
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to bring on a trip to Texas with me, I charged the battery through a mem card in it and was off to the airport.  Unfortunately the camera didn't work (it wouldn't turn on), so I returned it and got another.  The second one worked great, I was extremely happy with the picture quality, the size, and even the amount of pictures I could take per charge.The camera is very straight forward, the screen is a good size, and the buttons are adequate and clearly labeled.  This camera makes it hard to make mistakes.The downside was the fact that I didn't have a camera on my trip and also the face that you can change faceplated.  In my opinion this added a little bit to the width of the camera and is just unnecessary (for me at least).Other then that I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Simple, practical and comfortable
Reviews.Author: AC
Reviews.Content: It's a simple camera, which allows the user an uncomplicated handling. In my case I bought it for my mom and she has felt comfortable using this camera. It also allows to customize it by changing the appearance of the front panel. To begin to understand the art of photography, this Pentax model represents a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Camera
Reviews.Author: Baghdad
Reviews.Content: This Camera Works Amazing. I Got One For My Cousin For Her Graduation And She Loves It. If Someone Needs A Good Camera This Is The One To Choose.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: PAJ
Reviews.Content: Love the products. Everything I hoped for ... only one small issue. The door for the battery on the bottom of the camera opens WAY to easily. So much so I had to rig something up to keep it from opening all the time.

Reviews.Title: Optio 1000 from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Roland P
Reviews.Content: A great little camera from Amazon. Works absolutely trouble free. Recv'd in shorter time than expected.  Perfect packaging.  I can recommend this product and Amazon 100%.  Good pictures are made by good photographers, not by using the most expensive equipment. Know your equipment and I am sure you will be more than pleased with the final result.

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: villy
Reviews.Content: I like the size of the viewing screen, but the camera seems very plastic and I am not sure if it will hold up. As of yet, I haven't taken it on a vacation. If it were made of sturdier material- I'd be happier.  The flap that holds the the battery and memory card easily opens by itself and the camera won't read an older memory card.  I receive a 'not formatted' message, but my Pentax Optio I-10 reads the card without a problem. ??

Reviews.Title: Dont buy this one
Reviews.Author: Angel Perez
Reviews.Content: Worked for a few days with glitches. Then stopped working, the pictures arent good either! Not worth the money! I knew it was too cheap!

Reviews.Title: A decent budget camera
Reviews.Author: W. Reven "Walt Reven Jr"
Reviews.Content: Got this for someone as a christmas gift and tested it before hand. First off I will say this is not geared for a man or someone with large hands! Being a man I found it very hard to find the buttons or hold the camera. Now with that said I will say for a quick point and shoot camera it does what it's supposed to do, snap quick pics. Its geared more towards a womans hands or a teenager. Also dont expect this camera to do it all because it will dissapoint you if you buy it expecting it to do everything, it has its limitations.One other very very important thing to point out was this camera is supposed to come with a free $14.99 skinit dot com gift card and while it does ours came expired not once but twice! Amazon was quick and friendly to try and correct this mistake, pentax on the other hand forget it they still have not responded to my emails! Amazon shipped the second camera out extremely fast hoping the skinit gift card in that package wasn't expired but it to was. I am and always will be extremely impressed by amazons customer support and willingness to correct a mistake. Because the second card was also bad they decided to just reimburst us the cost of the gift card, again top notch customer service! Now for the pros and cons of the camera itselfPros----Small and built very wellFocuses very very fastExtremely accurate color reproduction, this camera amazed me with how good it picks up on colors and reproduces them!!!!Decent zoom for the size720p hd video recording, with one con(see below)Lots of fun and neat creative modes that actually work wellGood pictures if you use the flash, make sure its on!Decent hd video quality if in a brightly lit area onlyNeat how you can change the front faceplate with your own or bought designs!Decent flash fillCons----Horrible lcd color and qualityCannot zoom while taking a video and the mic location is in a bad spot, dont cover the mic with your fingers like I did!Pictures come out very blocky and grainy unless you turn the flash on or in a extremely well lit area! If you turn the flash on the pics come out fineBattery cover pops open way to easily and gets in the way!Not very good in low light and has problems focusin, again this is a budget camera so this is expectedThe buttons are tiny! I mean really tiny and hard to navigate, camera is geared for smaller handed people only

Reviews.Title: Didn't Work for me
Reviews.Author: J. Matthews "Over 40 Gamer"
Reviews.Content: I got it because it was a great deal.  But regretted it and had to return it.  It felt like a toy camera - but that was ok.  The problem was that the pictures were fuzzy no matter what setting I used.  The 'auto' setting consistently took poor pictures.  The video was great.  I was trying to replace my canon 170 which is bulkier.  The video was better than the canon (due to being 720p), but the pictures were nowhere near as good.  Happy that returns are easy at Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad..
Reviews.Author: Roses "RL"
Reviews.Content: First of all, when I purchased this item, it was pictured on Amazon with a tiger skin. The tiger skin did NOT come with this purchase. I was, however, able to get a different free skin with the included gift card, but still think the pic on Amazon was misleading.Secondly, the battery door keeps opening unexpectedly, which is annoying..The hardware on this camera looks plastic and cheap and I'm not sure it will stand up to the test of time. Looks like one of those cameras that are offered in a "get a free camera" promotion.Thirdly, wish the cord to download the pics was a bit longer, it doesn't reach the top of my desk.Pros:Takes an OK picture very quickly and is very compact. The interchangeable skin cover is a great idea, just wish the quality was there.

Reviews.Title: wishing i had kodak
Reviews.Author: gingersnap
Reviews.Content: i wish i had gotten a kodak. this camera has some great features but was hard to navigate around to find them. some of the editing features for the computer are fabulous though. the battery charges quickly which is great. the video was awful, no sound just clicky and staticky. some of the videos played back in a speeded up motion. wasnt the settings it was just random. i wouldnt buy this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is okay.  It does the job of taking pictures.  I don't care for the length of time in between pictures.  But, honestly I just miss my old camera and when I get a chance to buy a new one.  I think I will just give this one to my husband.  Overall the camera is not bad, if you are just looking for something to shoot pictures.

Reviews.Title: I will nor recommend this camera
Reviews.Author: dimadima88
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that can be used for shooting videos as well. This camera takes great pictures, however the video quality is poor. It is no where near HD quality as listed on the  description. I had to return the camera for refund.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Work
Reviews.Author: Scott Dobby
Reviews.Content: When recording a video the sound doesn't work. I researched the problem online and saw that it happened often with this product, I would steer clear altogether.

Reviews.Title: Fair deal
Reviews.Author: deep123
Reviews.Content: It was a fair deal. one week after the purchase, same product is available at $89.The picture quality is ok. But the picture clicked in night becomes dark, which i didn't like. But what else you expect in $99.Good feature about video is it has inbuilt speaker so that you can hear the voice on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera broke on first use
Reviews.Author: Kristie Campbell
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my best friend. I charged the battery so that she would be able to use it on her birthday. She was so excited that she was going to be able to take pictures of her party.  Well she took one picture and the camera shut off and the lens would not go back in.  I am extremely disappointed with this product-what a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: Camera is light but the photo quality is REALLY bad. Day lights are OK and still it seems to be focusing only on the photo center, night photos are completely blur.Also feels cheap, battery cover don't close well. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Tarda demasiado
Reviews.Author: willians
Reviews.Content: buenas tardes no entiendo porque tardan ntanto en eviar un producto si cuando piden el medo de envio dice que son de 2 a tres dias ya tengo casi una semana y no lo han enviado

Reviews.Title: Broke after 30 pictures, missing parts
Reviews.Author: kanlaon
Reviews.Content: HORRIBLE, do not buy, it was missing the USB cord in the box, so I wrote to pentax and they said the best they could do was give me a 10% refund.  I decided to keep it and after taking only 30 pictures, the lens seemed to have broken because EVERYTHING was green in the pictures and videos.

Reviews.Title: scratched surface
Reviews.Author: malcobi
Reviews.Content: I got a last friday Pantax Optio RS1000. but i saw front side panel mark that scratched. i want to receive front side panel part.

ProductInfo.Features:
Infinitely customizable; interchangeable cosmetic skins uniquely suit the photographer
Ultra slim, lightweight, and pocketable
14.1-megapixel CCD; 4x wide angle zoom lens (28-110mm)
Widescreen 720p HD video at 30 frames per second
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio RS1000 14 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 3-Inch LCD
